column4: Ok, for the last time today: Who can I contact to get my WLAN working?
Can I make the "system bars" in Ubuntu floating?
Okay, then what do you mean by floating?
You can click on an empty space and drag them around...
No, that just puts them on another edge
You cant drop them in the middle of the screen if thats what you're asking
There is no easy way to do what you are asking because these files are in a PPA and not the official Ubuntu repositories.
This is the best I can do: https://edge.launchpad.net/~kubuntu-experimental/+archive/ppa
No kind of web client anywhere that I can browse that with? Or local windows client that runs from USB drives?
These packages were just not designed to be downloaded from anything other than apt.
I think that I should create something like a APT browser fro Windows...
